DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect on exercise tolerance, lung function and symptoms after treatment with Symbicort, Oxis or placebo in patients with severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Efficacy on Exercise Tolerance of Symbicort (Budesonide/Formoterol) Compared to Placebo and Oxis in Patients With Severe COPD
DOC.criteria: >=40 years of age diagnosed COPD with symptoms >= 2 years prebronchodilatory FEV1 <=50% of PN Current respiratory tract disorder other than COPD history of asthma or rhinitis significant or unstable cardiovascular disorder
